## getContentType() function

Get the content-type header value from the request

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getContentType(req: Request): string | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  req | Request | Http request |

**Returns:**

string \| undefined
